monster.name: Smidge
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: Smidge has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight, hearing or smell.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy (Pseudodragon)
entries: Smidge can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Wizard's Familiar
entries: Smidge acts independently of Apollo, but it always obeys his commands. In combat, it rolls its own initiative and acts on its own turn. Smidge can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.
A tiny dragon who acts as Apollo's familiar.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Raoul can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 10} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

trait.name: Sentinel Raven
entries: Raoul is a spirit sent by the Raven Queen to watch over Daaé. The spirit assumes the form and game statistics of a raven, and it always obeys their commands, which they can give telepathically while it is within 100 feet of them.

While Raoul is perched on Daaé's shoulder, they gain darkvision with a range of 30 feet and a bonus to their passive Wisdom (Perception) score and to Wisdom (Perception) checks. The bonus equals their Charisma modifier. While perched on their shoulder, Raoul can't be targeted by any attack or other harmful effect; only they can cast spells on it; it can't take damage; and it is {@condition incapacitated}.

Daaé can see through the Raoul's eyes and hear what it hears while it is within 100 feet of them. In combat, it rolls its own initiative but Daaé controls how it acts. If it is slain by a creature, they gain advantage on all attack rolls against the killer for the next 24 hours.

Raoul doesn't require sleep. While it is within 100 feet of Daaé, it can awaken you from sleep as a bonus action. Raoul vanishes when it dies, if Daaé dies, or if the two of them are separated by more than 5 miles.
At the end of a short or long rest, Daaé can call the raven back to you—no matter where it is or whether it died—and it reappears within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@damage 1} damage.
A spirit from the Shadowfel who watches over Daaé.
